attributes.additional_details: adhd appears to be deemed by the say of a parent to a doctor,who then asks if a child is disruptive at school. bang! about an extra £100 a week (disability and until 18 yrs carers allowance ) for not allowing people to chastise children (do gooders).common sense should not allow parents to get extra for not being able too control these ferrel kids (often single parent or living on benefits) why is being bad often rewarded in our society?.at great cost to the taxpayer.
